think_procedure: First, we read the description of the knob. The knob 'max_slot_wal_keep_size' is used to specify the maximum size of WAL files that replication slots are allowed to retain. If this knob is set to -1, it allows replication slots to retain an unlimited amount of WAL files, which is a different function compared to its regular operation. Therefore, this knob can be classified as a 'special knob'. The special value in this case is -1.
